scripts.start: npm run-script clean:project && webpack --env goal=dev --progress --profile && concurrently "webpack-dev-server --env goal=dev" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build: npm run-script clean:project && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env goal=prod --progress --profile && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:pwa: npm run-script clean:project && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env goal=pwa --progress --profile && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.bundle:workbox: rimraf ./_site && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=workbox bundle exec jekyll build && workbox generateSW ./config/workbox.config.js
